article.title: Working with External Models in Simphony

section.title: Overview
section.para: Repast Simphony comes with support for working with external models. Provided are classes that will take in data, feed it to a model, run the model, and gather more data back. Currently, the primary way to transfer data to the external model and in from the external model is through files. This support is provided through the Data File utilities which use a xml based descriptor file to specify the format data should be input from or output to.
